meanings.sent1: The forgeability of the metal allowed it to be easily shaped into intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith tested the forgeability of the steel by hammering it into a new tool.
meanings.sent3: The forgeability of the clay made it a favorite material for pottery classes.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity had a forgeability that could mold any idea into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The forgeability of the dough made it perfect for shaping into different types of bread.

meanings.definition: The ability to be easily shaped or formed by forging.
meanings.sent1: The forgeability of the metal allowed it to be easily shaped into intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith tested the forgeability of the steel by hammering it into a new tool.
meanings.sent3: The forgeability of the clay made it a favorite material for pottery classes.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity had a forgeability that could mold any idea into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The forgeability of the dough made it perfect for shaping into different types of bread.
